layout_cues: Anchor the Δ glyph and key numbers in Electric Teal (#00BFA6) to create an instant visual hook.
Use the Deep Navy background to frame the top banner and footer for a signature boardroom presence.
Deploy Soft Gray tiles for data tables; reserve accent colors strictly for deltas and callouts.

swatches.typography: White for headings, accent color for Δ

layout_cues: Swap the accent slot hex with the organization’s core color to harmonize with existing guidelines.
Keep typography neutral (black or white) so the Δ framing adapts cleanly across templates.
Use light tiles against the charcoal primary to maintain clarity without committing to a bespoke brand signal.

palette_strip.presentation: Arrange as horizontal chips with captioned roles for designer packets.
Label the third chip as "Insert Brand Accent" to signal customization.

designer_notes: Provide hex plus usage cue beneath each chip when exporting to PDF or Figma components.
Include Δ glyph mockups (positive vs. negative) using the accent and variance colors for clarity.
Pair typography guidance: headings in IBM Plex Sans Bold, body in Inter Regular to match existing decks.
